name: Popularity Of Crypto
description: Popularity of Cryptos was developed with React-Redux. You can see your favorite coins price, volume and etc datas.

name: Nice Car
description: Nice Car is an application which you can rent cars, add cars and delete the cars. For front end used React, for back and use Postgresql and Ruby on Rails

name: Budget App
description: Budget App is a Ruby on Rails project in which you can create new categories, you can write new transactions and deploy it to the categories, and finally you can control how much money you spend in each category.

name: The LOTR Lovers Conference
description: The LOTR Lovers-Conference is JavaScript capstone project and it is an imaginary a conference project created with JavaScript, HTML and CSS .

name: JavaScript Capstone
description: JavaScript Capstone is a website which you can see pokemons, you can like and you can leave about pokemons.

name: Space Travellers
description: Space Travellers a web application for a company that provides commercial and scientific space travel services. The application will allow users to book rockets and join selected space missions.
